product_name: Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Insulated Handheld Water Bottle - 18 fl. oz.
long_description: The functional and comfortable Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Insulated Handheld Water Bottle boasts Fire & Ice(TM) insulation, a natural grip and easy-squeeze access to fluids. 18 fl. oz., double-wall insulated, reflective SpeedDraw Flask with race cap offers quick bursts of fluid and keeps liquids cooler longer. Fully adjustable hand strap with thumbhole enables grip-free running. The Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Insulated Handheld Water Bottle features a large, expandable zippered pocket that can carry a phone, keys, ID and other running essentials.
short_description: The functional and comfortable Nathan SpeedDraw Plus Insulated Handheld Water Bottle boasts Fire & Ice(TM) insulation, a natural grip and easy-squeeze access to fluids.
